==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
''Available before completing ''The Case of the Crafting Bench''.''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Ogun:''' As for today's training... Yes, that should do it.
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing here?
::'''Ogun:''' I'm a coach. Other than developing training regimens, I don't have much else to do.
:{{DIcon}} Sorry to bother you.
::'''Ogun:''' Mm-hmm.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Available after completing ''The Case of the Crafting Bench''.''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Ogun:''' As for today's training... Yes, that should do it.
:{{DIcon}} About what happened before...
::'''Ogun:''' Though the process had a few twists and turns, the outcome was as I expected.
::'''Ogun:''' ...Are you waiting for more commentary? But I've already said all I wish to.
:{{DIcon}} I'll leave you to it, then.
::'''Ogun:''' Very well.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Etymology===
